Title: Controlling Bullet
HeadLine: {1: 'Controlling Bullet: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After pinging a Yellow Orb, the next Red Orb bullet will inflict <color=#D91414>Blast</color>. Bullet explodes after hitting the target, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in the area.'}

Title: Lotus - Dual Blades
HeadLine: {1: 'Lotus - Dual Blades: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Lucia: Lotus enters Burst Form when a Red Orb is pinged within 4s after any 3-Ping, replacing Basic Attacks with <color=#D91414>Dual Blades</color>. Lotus - Dual Blades: Attacks the enemy multiple times, dealing Physical DMG.'}

Title: Laser Cluster
HeadLine: {1: 'Laser Cluster: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After any 3-Ping, the next Red Orb skill will unleash Laser Cluster that deals Physical DMG.'}

Title: Quiver Of Mercy
HeadLine: {1: 'Quiver of Mercy: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Tap Signature</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Stores 1 energy arrow in the quiver after every 3-Ping. All arrows will be released when casting the next Signature Move, dealing Extra Physical DMG to the target.'}

Title: EX - Slash Storm
HeadLine: {1: 'EX - Slash Storm: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Yellow Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'When pinging a Yellow Orb after any 3-Ping, Nanami: Storm will cast EX - Slash Storm to launch consecutive attacks at nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.'}

Title: Offence-Defense Rhythm
HeadLine: {1: 'Offence-Defense Rhythm: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>'}
Description: {1: "Gains Charge points after any 3-Ping. When there are Charge points, Kamui: Bastion's ATK increases. Charge points decrease over time."}

Title: Artillery Tactics
HeadLine: {1: 'Artillery Tactics: <color=#0d70bc>Three 3-Pings + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After <color=#D91414>3</color> 3-Pings or a Signature Move, Karenina: Blast will enter the <color=#D91414>Burst Form</color> and her next Basic Attack will become a ranged artillery attack.'}

Title: Fleeting Phantom
HeadLine: {1: 'Fleeting Phantom: <color=#0d70bc>Two 3-Pings + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'The final strike of each 3-Ping marks the target. Releases a shade when the mark reaches <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. The shade attacks once with every Basic Attack.'}

Title: Reversed Egretfield
HeadLine: {1: 'Reversed Egretfield: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Reb Orb (chance to trigger)/Ping Blue Orb + Tap Basic Attack (chance to trigger)</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Enemies marked by Basic Attacks have a chance to summon <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> and deal Lightning DMG. Red Orb pings have a chance to trigger <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color>. After <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> is triggered <color=#D91414>4</color> times, the next <color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color> will summon <color=#D91414>Ex : Lightning Lure</color>, dealing Lightning DMG and healing allies within range.'}

Title: Lotus - Lightning Dance
HeadLine: {1: 'Lotus - Lightning Dance: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow/Blue Orb + Tap Basic Attack (chance to trigger)</color>'}
Description: {1: '<color=#D91414>Lightning Lure</color>: Attacking a marked enemy has a chance to summon a lightning bolt to strike the target, dealing Lightning DMG.'}

Title: Fighting Will
HeadLine: {1: 'Fighting Will: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Fighting Will: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Form + Passive</color>'}
Description: {1: '3-Pings give <color=#D91414>10</color> extra Energy.', 2: 'Increases Physical and Dark Resistance when in the <color=#D91414>Dark Form</color>.'}

Title: Goddess Connection System
HeadLine: {1: 'Goddess Connection System: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping/After triggering Light Penalty 5 times</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After a 3-Ping or 5 casts of <color=#D91414>Light Penalty</color>, restores HP to ally units around the character.'}

Title: Chronoshot
HeadLine: {1: 'Space Lord: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After any 3-Ping, pinging the next Red Orb will fire consecutive shots that strike the target, dealing Physical DMG.'}

Title: Thermal System
HeadLine: {1: 'Thermal System: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping/Cast Signature Move</color>', 2: 'Enhanced Form: <color=#0d70bc>Thermal Energy reaches 50%</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Gains Thermal Energy upon entering battle. Thermal Energy can be gained via 3-Pings and Signature Move.', 2: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Enhanced Form</color> once Thermal Energy reaches 50%, gaining Fire DMG Bonus and granting additional effects to Signal Orb skills and Basic Attacks. Thermal Energy decreases over time in <color=#D91414>Enhanced Form</color>.'}

Title: Overclocking Resonance
HeadLine: {1: 'Overclock: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Signature Move + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: "Upon casting a Signature Move, Nanami: Pulse enters the <color=#D91414>Overclocking Form</color> and her Basic Attacks will deal Fire DMG instead. Meanwhile, reduces the target's Fire Resistance on hit for <color=#D91414>8</color>s."}

Title: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will
HeadLine: {1: 'Crimson Abyss - Blade Will: <color=#0d70bc>Blue 3-Ping + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Swordwave: <color=#0d70bc>Blade Will Form + Ping Blade Will Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After a Blue Orb 3-Ping, Lucia: Crimson Abyss will fall back and enter the <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color> after another 3-Ping, converting all Signal Orbs into Signal Orbs and gaining <color=#D91414>2</color> additional <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orbs</color>. In the <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color>, the subsequent Basic Attacks will convert all Signal Orbs obtained into <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orbs</color>.', 2: 'Upon a <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orb</color> ping, casts a swordwave to attack the target, dealing Physical DMG. Has Super Armor throughout the process.'}

Title: Cosmic Wave
HeadLine: {1: 'Cosmic Wave: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Red Orb</color>', 2: 'Enhanced Shadow Form: <color=#0d70bc>Enhanced Shadow Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Pinging a Red Orb after any 3-Ping transforms Watanabe into a shadow that launches consecutive attacks in front of him, dealing Dark DMG. Enters <color=#D91414>Enhanced Shadow Form</color> at the end of the attack.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Enhanced Shadow Form</color>, Basic Attacks and <color=#D91414>Trailblade</color> will also deal Dark DMG.'}

Title: Vector Cube
HeadLine: {1: 'Vector Cube: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'When pinging a Blue Orb after any 3-Ping, charges in place to pull the nearby enemies in and gains Shield, then unleashes a heavy strike to the targets ahead that deals Physical DMG. Extra DMG Reduction increases by <color=#D91414>70%</color> when charging.'}

Title: Critical Moment
HeadLine: {1: 'Critical Moment: <color=#0d70bc>Red 3-Ping + Ping Blue Orb</color>', 2: 'Lightning Arrow: <color=#0d70bc>Sniping Form + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Critical Moment: <color=#0d70bc>Sniping Form + Tap Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Enters the <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> upon performing a Blue Orb ping after a Red Orb 3-Ping.', 2: 'Basic Attacks launched in the <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> will fire a long-range Lightning Arrow that deals Lightning DMG to the target. Exits the Sniping Form <color=#D91414>6s</color> later or after <color=#D91414>6</color> arrows are fired. Basic Attacks launched in the <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> will not restore Signal Orbs.', 3: 'Dodging in the <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> will reduce the charge time of the next Basic Attack.'}

Title: Field Supplies
HeadLine: {1: 'Field Supplies: <color=#0d70bc>Last hit of Basic Attack/Any 3-Ping/Cast Signature Move/Cast QTE + Pick up Energy Ball</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Sophia: Silverfang drops an Energy Ball after any of the following: the last hit of Basic Attack, dealing DMG with a 3-Ping skill, casting Signature Move, or casting QTE. Picking up an Energy Ball heals all the allies within range and grants <color=#D91414>Fire Tempered</color>, increasing Fire DMG. Whenever an Energy Ball is picked up, Sophia: Silverfang gains Energy and Heat. Her ATK increases based on the current Heat.'}

Title: Arclight Shield
HeadLine: {1: 'Arclight Shield: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Pinging a Blue Orb after any 3-Ping generates Shield. When Shield expires or is replaced by a new Shield, it explodes and deals Lightning DMG to nearby targets.'}

Title: Hyperborea
HeadLine: {1: 'Hyperborea: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Hyperborea: <color=#0d70bc>Arctic Form + Any 3-Ping</color>'}
Description: {1: 'While in the Normal Form, every 3-Ping grants Energy and Signature Point (up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Points in the Normal Form).', 2: "In <color=#D91414>Arctic Form</color>, Energy decreases over time. While there is still Energy, Ice DMG increases and every 3-Ping grants <color=#D91414>1</color> Signature Point (up to <color=#D91414>4</color> in Arctic Form). When casting the Signature Move, it can still benefit from the Core Passive's DMG Bonus if there is still Energy left."}

Title: Mass Illusion
HeadLine: {1: 'Mass Illusion: <color=#0d70bc>Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Mass Illusion: <color=#0d70bc>Sufficient Overclock Points + Press and hold Basic Attack + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Gains bonus Overclock Points from pinging orbs. Automatically restores Overclock Points every second.', 2: "When there are enough Overclock Points, press and hold the Basic Attack button to unleash Vera's core attack. Tap Basic Attack again to make her unleash the follow-up core attack. The core attack deals area Dark DMG and deals bonus Physical DMG to targets in melee range. Casting core attacks will consume Overclock Points and return energy."}

Title: Surging Madness
HeadLine: {1: 'Surging Madness: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Surging Madness: <color=#0d70bc>Berserk Form + Passive activates</color>'}
Description: {1: 'In the normal state, any 3-Ping will accumulate <color=#D91414>Madness</color> stacks. Upon full stacks of <color=#D91414>Madness</color>, any 3-Ping will grant additional Signature Energy.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>, spends all <color=#D91414>Rage</color> stacks. Deals more DMG in the <color=#D91414>Berserk Form</color>.'}

Title: Valkyrie Heart
HeadLine: {1: 'Rigor Heart: <color=#0d70bc>Has Energy Points + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Rigor Heart: <color=#0d70bc>Has Energy Points + Tap Signature</color>', 3: 'Wide-Area Electromagnetic Cannon: <color=#0d70bc>Full Burst Form + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Rosetta: Rigor has up to <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy charges. Any 3-Ping will consume <color=#D91414>1</color> charge to enhance her skills and provide a Extra DMG bonus.', 2: 'Rosetta: Rigor has <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Points. Upon casting a Signature, spends up to <color=#D91414>2</color> Energy Points and gains a Physical DMG Bonus.', 3: 'When all Energy Points are used up, Rosetta: Rigor enters <color=#D91414>Full Burst Form</color>. Press and hold the Basic Attack button in this form to charge and fire the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color> once the charging reaches maximum, dealing Physical DMG while restoring Signature Energy, and inflicting the target with <color=#D91414>Piercing Blow</color>. While charging, her Extra DMG Reduction increases. Energy Points will be restored after firing the <color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>.'}

Title: Concentrated Will
HeadLine: {1: 'Concentrated Will Form: <color=#0d70bc>Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Concentrated Will Form: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will Form</color>', 3: 'Red Concentration: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will Form + Ping Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Yellow Concentration: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will Form + Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 5: 'Blue Concentration: <color=#0d70bc>Concentrated Will Form + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Gains Sync Rate from pinging orbs. When the Sync Rate is at maximum, Signal Orbs are enhanced, and Qu enters the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will Form</color> once an orb is pinged.', 2: 'Can only perform 1-Pings in the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will Form</color>. 1-Pings will cast a 3-Ping Skill and cause <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will effects</color>. Signal Orb Pings will consume Sync Rate and will not grant Energy. Consumes Sync Rate over time in the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will Form</color>. Exits the <color=#D91414>Concentrated Will Form</color> and cancel Signal Orb Enhancement effects when all Sync Rate is consumed.', 3: 'Red Concentration: Bashes the ground to deal Physical DMG.', 4: 'Yellow Concentration: Unleashes a shockwave forward to deal Physical DMG.', 5: 'Blue Concentration: Releases a whirlwind that follows Qu around, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.'}

Title: Follow-Up
HeadLine: {1: 'Follow-Up: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>', 2: 'Red Orb Follow-Up: <color=#0d70bc>Red Orb 3-Ping + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>', 3: 'Blue Orb Follow-Up: <color=#0d70bc>Blue Orb 3-Ping + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>', 4: 'Yellow Orb Follow-Up: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow Orb 3-Ping + Tap Follow-Up Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'At the start of battle, gains a grayed-out Follow-Up Orb (cannot be tapped or pinged). The Follow-Up Orb will light up upon a 3-Ping. Tap it to perform different follow-up skills based on the color of orbs pinged.', 2: 'Red Orb Follow-Up: Use an overhead kick to deal Ice DMG. Basic Attack after Red Follow-Up starts from the 4th hit.', 3: 'Blue Orb Follow-Up: Conjures ice lances from the ground around to deal AOE Ice DMG and slow the enemies temporarily, leaving a <color=#D91414>Crystal Ice Mirror</color>.', 4: 'Yellow Orb Follow-Up: Leaps backward and conjures ice pieces to pull nearby enemies together. The ice pieces then explode to deal area Ice DMG.'}

Title: Singularity
HeadLine: {1: 'Singularity: <color=#0d70bc>At least 15 Annihilation Points + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Singularity: <color=#0d70bc>Annihilation Form + Ping Annihilation Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Luna: Laurel gains Annihilation Points after every 3-Ping. Her next ping will be counted as a 3-Ping. 3-Pings generated by the Matrix will be consumed first. When there are a certain amount of Annihilation Pts, press and hold the Basic Attack button to enter <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, deal AOE Dark DMG, hide the original Signal Orbs, and gain <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orbs</color> based on the current Annihilation Points. When this skill is cast, Luna will become invincible, and QTEs not in cooldown will be activated. In <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, entering the Matrix will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color>, launching Basic Attacks will consume Annihilation Points. When the Annihilation Points drop to <color=#D91414>0</color> or when another character is switched in, Luna will exit <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>. Switching to another character will consume all Annihilation Points. Exiting <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>will rearrange the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Annihilation State</color>, perform a <color=#D91414>Annihilation Orb</color> ping to cast 4 spikes, dealing Dark DMG and gaining Energy.'}

Title: Blade Rend
HeadLine: {1: 'Blade Rend: <color=#0d70bc>Yellow 3-Ping + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Blade Rend: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Tap Basic Attack/Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 3: 'Blade Rend: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Ping Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Blade Rend: <color=#0d70bc>Battle Stance + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: "After a Yellow Orb 3-Ping, perform any 3-Ping to gain <color=#D91414>Stability</color>. <color=#D91414>Stability</color> decreases over time and its duration cannot be refreshed by triggering another 3-Ping. The character will enter <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color> when there is <color=#D91414>Stability</color>. Exiting <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color> will clear all <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color> stacks. <color=#D91414>Data Correction's</color> duration can be refreshed by gaining the effect again or casting a Signature Move. No <color=#D91414>Stability</color> will be consumed when the Signature Move is being cast.", 2: 'When the character is in <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Basic Attacks and Yellow Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG.', 3: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Red Orbs also launch Swordwaves that deal Physical DMG and add <color=#D91414>Data Correction</color>, granting Physical DMG Bonus.', 4: 'In <color=#D91414>Battle Stance</color>, Blue Orbs can interrupt enemy attacks.'}

Title: Overclock Strike
HeadLine: {1: 'Overclock Strike: <color=#0d70bc>At least 50 Overclock Energy + Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Overclock Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Overclock Indicator</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Has a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> at the beginning of the battle. Upon a 3-Ping, if there is enough <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color>, spends <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> and gains an <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> (maximum 1 on the battlefield) of the corresponding color on the rightmost side of the ping bar. The <color=#D91414>Overclock Energy</color> will restore over time.', 2: 'Tap the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> to consume all orbs of the same color and summon a POD CUB to unleash multiple projectiles that deal Physical DMG (pinging <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> is not considered a ping). If the <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> effect pings more than 3 Signal Orbs, gains a number of random Signal Orbs equal to the excess number of orbs pinged. When 9S leaves the field, reduces his swap cooldown according to how many times <color=#D91414>Overclock Indicator</color> has been triggered.'}

Title: Prototype
HeadLine: {1: 'Prototype: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Sliding: <color=#0d70bc>Moving + Press and hold Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: "Perform any 3-Ping to grant A2 <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> and summon a CUB to launch <color=#D91414>6</color> seeker missiles toward random targets in front, dealing Physical DMG and granting <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> on hit. Missiles also <color=#D91414>Taunt</color> the enemy. (While taunted, the target's DEF is reduced. If 2B and 9S are also in the team, this <color=#D91414>effect is doubled</color>.)", 2: 'While moving, press and hold the Dodge Button to cause A2 to begin sliding. Gains <color=#D91414>POD: Shield</color> after sliding for a period of time. The Dodge Gauge will not recover while sliding, but A2 will emit electricity to <color=#D91414>continuously pull</color> nearby enemies.'}

Title: Cold Snap
HeadLine: {1: 'Blooming Shot: <color=#0d70bc>Tactical Stance + Release Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Cold Snap: <color=#0d70bc>Tactical Stance + Release Basic Attack + Successful Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: 'During the <color=#D91414>Tactical Stance</color>, release Basic Attack to trigger the <color=#D91414>Blooming Shot</color>, dealing Ice DMG to the linear area ahead.', 2: 'The backstep of <color=#D91414>Blooming Shot</color> is able to evade enemy attacks. If this move successfully dodges an attack, Wanshi will become invincible for a long time during the follow-up sniping shot and deal Ice DMG.'}

Title: Tertian
HeadLine: {1: 'Chord: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping any orb</color>', 2: 'Concerto: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping orbs with the same color as the 3-Ping</color>', 3: 'Solo: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Ping orbs with a different color as the 3-Ping</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Upon a 3-Ping, gains the <color=#D91414>Triad</color> of the same color. The next ping will trigger <color=#D91414>Chord</color>. When <color=#D91414>Chord</color> is triggered, gains <color=#D91414>Tune</color> based on the number of orbs pinged through <color=#D91414>Chord</color>.', 2: "Upon pinging Signal Orb(s) of the same color to that of the <color=#D91414>Triad</color>, inflicts <color=#D91414>Concerto</color> on the target enemy: Deals Lightning DMG and reduces the target's Lightning DMG Bonus.", 3: 'Upon pinging Signal Orb(s) of a different color to that of the <color=#D91414>Triad</color>, gains <color=#D91414>Solo</color>: Gains Extra DMG Bonus.'}

Title: Frost Origin
HeadLine: {1: 'Frost Origin: <color=#0d70bc>Energy full + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: "During battle, Chrome: Glory's HP is compressed to <color=#D91414>40%</color>, with the remaining <color=#D91414>60%</color> filled with <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> that automatically regenerates over time. When he has full Energy, press and hold Basic Attack to empty the <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> capacity and activate <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form, rearranging all Signal Orbs. All 3-Pings made in this form will gain <color=#D91414>Condensed Frost</color> without consuming <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color>, but <color=#D91414>Glorious Shield</color> cannot automatically regenerate while <color=#D91414>Frost Spirit</color> Form is active. Chrome: Glory creates <color=#D91414>Eroding Chill</color> around himself, dealing Ice DMG to enemies periodically and inflicting them with <color=#D91414>Frost Corrosion</color> that reduces their Ice Resistance."}

Title: Shadow Prism Agglomerate
HeadLine: {1: 'Shadow Prism Attack: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack consecutively</color>', 2: 'Resonance Pulse: <color=#0d70bc>Co-Bot + Twilight Matrix present</color>', 3: 'Instant Dodge: <color=#0d70bc>Control Locked + Tap Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: "No. 21: XXI's Basic Attacks will gather <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>. With a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>, the next Basic Attack cast will clear <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Energy</color>, cast <color=#D91414>Shadow Prism Attack</color>, generate <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's spot, knock down the target, and deal Dark DMG. When the Twilight Matrix is generated, No. 21: XXI will gain Signature Energy and Dodge Energy.", 2: "When the Co-Bot's Force Wave destroys a Twilight Matrix, it will trigger a <color=#D91414>Resonance Pulse</color>, dealing Dark DMG to nearby enemies.", 3: "When No. 21: XXI is control locked (such as when attacked, downed, or in mid-air), press the Dodge button at the cost of extra Dodge Energy to perform Instant Dodge to negate all control-locking states and create <color=#D91414>1</color> Twilight Matrix on the target's location. Instant Dodge grants No. 21: XXI Super Armor and Shield."}

Title: Lightning Fall
HeadLine: {1: 'Electric Charge: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Spear Lunge</color>', 2: 'Lightning Fall: <color=#0d70bc>Electric Charge present + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Using <color=#D91414>Spear Lunge</color> will grant 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Electric Charge</color>. Stacks up to 3 times.', 2: "With 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Electric Charge</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Lightning Fall</color> at the cost of <color=#D91414>Electric Charge</color> and pull enemies in the large area ahead, dealing Lightning DMG and inflicting <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> that reduces the enemies' Lightning Resistance for 8s. Every stack of <color=#D91414>Electric Charge</color> consumed will double <color=#D91414>Lightning Fall's</color> DMG. Gains Super Armor when Lightning Fall is active."}

Title: Art of Deception
HeadLine: {1: 'Art of Deception: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger valid combos</color>'}
Description: {1: "The Basic Attack combo DMG ratio is adjusted. Gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> based on the combo type upon triggering <color=#D91414>valid combos</color>. Roland's Red/Yellow/Blue Orbs are unlocked when there are a certain amount of <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Each time the 1st or 2nd hit of a Signal Orb skill is cast, <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> will be consumed to generate Energy. The combos of Basic Attacks and Signal Orb skills can be viewed in the description of each skill. <color=#D91414>Valid combos</color>: The Basic Attack combo launched within 1s after dealing DMG from Basic Attacks. Upon triggering Matrix, the next Signal Orb skill cast does not consume any <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or <color=#D91414>Trickery Points</color>. Roland cannot gain Signal Orbs from Basic Attacks. When he is switched off battle, he gains <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>. Signal Orbs gained from any other source would be directly converted into <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color> or Energy, prioritizing <color=#D91414>Deception Points</color>."}

Title: Ode for Everlight
HeadLine: {1: 'Divine Prayer: <color=#0d70bc>Double tap Dodge</color>', 2: 'Purity Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Same-colored 3-Pings</color>', 3: 'Chaos Oath: <color=#0d70bc>Divine Prayer + Different-colored 3-Pings</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Basic Attacks and pinging orbs accumulate Prayer. When it is full, <color=#D91414>double tap</color> or <color=#D91414>press and hold</color> the Dodge button to trigger <color=#D91414>Divine Prayer</color> that grants DMG Reduction. While in Divine Prayer, it is allowed to ping 2 sets of orbs. The orbs pinged during the prayer will amplify it and increase the base multiplier. Each time orbs are pinged, triggers <color=#D91414>Prayer Ripple</color> that deals Fire DMG to enemies, imprisons them, and heals allies. When <color=#D91414>Core Passive - Ode for Everlight</color> reaches Lv.22, entering Divine Prayer will grant <color=#D91414>1</color> random Signal Orb, and casting Oaths will restore Dodge Energy.', 2: 'With 2 sets of same-colored Signal Orbs, casts <color=#D91414>Purity Oath</color> and deals AOE Fire DMG.', 3: 'If the two sets of Signal Orbs have different colors, triggers <color=#D91414>Chaos Oath</color> that pulls enemies in an extremely large area, dealing Fire DMG to them and <color=#D91414>a small amount of dodgeable DMG to Liv: Empyrea</color>.'}

Title: Phantasia
HeadLine: {1: 'Reprise: Echo: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Direction button</color>', 2: 'Reprise: Twin Stars: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Shooting Star Orb + Direction button</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Upon a 3-Ping, moving the joystick will cause Selena: Capriccio to summon a phantom. The phantom will continue to cast the original skill, and Selena herself will gain Super Armor and cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Echo</color> instead.', 2: 'After Selena: Capriccio casts <color=#D91414>Shooting Star</color>, drag the joystick to cast <color=#D91414>Reprise: Twin Stars</color>, deal Dark DMG, and summon one phantom on spot.'}

Title: Snow Dragon
HeadLine: {1: 'Snow Dragon: <color=#0d70bc>Whenever catching Dragon Axe</color>', 2: 'Snow Dragon: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack + Ping any orb</color>', 3: 'Dragon Force Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Yellow Orb + Ping Red Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Whenever Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe, she will throw it again, dealing the same effect as <color=#D91414>Spirit Blade: Dragon Throw</color>.', 2: 'Basic Attacks and Signal Orb Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color>.', 3: 'If Pulao: Dragontoll catches Dragon Axe when performing her Red/Blue/Yellow Orb skill, consumes <color=#D91414>Dragon Force</color> to unleash <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color>, with which tapping the Basic Attack button repeatedly will perform a follow-up combo that deals Physical DMG. While performing <color=#D91414>Dragon Force Combo</color> and the follow-up combo, Pulao: Dragontoll gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction.'}

Title: Soul of Molten Steel
HeadLine: {1: 'Slide Mode: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge/Cast Quantum Compression Shot/Flame Bombing</color>', 2: 'Bzzz Form: <color=#0d70bc>"Rumbling" Form + Cast Ironsoul Slice + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Oops! Missed it!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Form + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging halfway</color>', 4: 'Perfect!: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Form + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging more than halfway</color>', 5: 'Burning Blow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 200 Pressure + "Bzzz" Form + Press and hold Basic Attack, then release when charging to the limit</color>', 6: 'Mirage Flash: <color=#0d70bc>"Bzzz" Form + Release Basic Attack + Successful Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: 'You can tap and hold Dodge or cast <color=#D91414>Quantum Compression Shot</color>/<color=#D91414>Flame Bombing</color> for Nanami: Starfarer to start sliding. While this is active, you can cast the above skills with no intervals.', 2: 'Nanami: Starfarer gains a Pressure Gauge in the <color=#D91414>"Rumbling" Mode</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color> hits an enemy, press and hold Basic Attack to make Nanami enter the <color=#D91414>"Bzzz" Form</color>. While this is active, release Basic Attack at different times to trigger <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> or <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color>.', 3: 'When <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> is cast, releases the accumulated Signature Energy, gains Super Armor, and gains Extra DMG Reduction. <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> will all deal Fire DMG.', 4: 'When <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> is cast, releases the accumulated Signature Energy, gains Super Armor, and gains Extra DMG Reduction. <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> of <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice I</color>, <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice II</color>, and <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice III</color> will all deal Fire DMG.', 5: 'When there is enough Pressure, press and hold Basic Attack to the limit to consume all Pressure and cast <color=#D91414>Burning Blow</color> to restore Signature Energy and grant the DMG multiplier of <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> plus a DMG Bonus based on the Pressure consumed to the corresponding <color=#D91414>Ironsoul Slice</color>. The Base DMG of this skill is increased based on the amount of Pressure consumed. Once the total DMG is calculated, it will be recorded. When Nanami: Starfarer casts <color=#D91414>Gigabyte Star Strike</color>, she will become temporarily invincible and deal a portion of the recorded DMG again, after which the record will be reset.', 6: 'Nanami can dodge during a period after <color=#D91414>"Oops! Missed it!"</color> or <color=#D91414>"Perfect!"</color> is cast. If she successfully dodges an attack, Nanami will cast <color=#D91414>Mirage Flash</color>, dealing Fire DMG and gaining Pressure.'}

Title: Huntress' Command
HeadLine: {1: 'Bitter Frost: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Press and hold Dodge to activate and charge <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>. Release Dodge when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is fully charged to cast <color=#D91414>Bitter Frost</color> and deal Ice DMG. Releasing Dodge before fully charged will result in no attacks, and <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> will gradually decrease. Getting hit while charging will deduct Dodge Gauge and perform Flash if there is enough Dodge available. Gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction when <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color> is activated.'}

Title: Space Walk
HeadLine: {1: 'Leap Attack: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping available + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Anti-gravity Form: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Leap Attack</color>', 3: 'Radiant Whirlwind: <color=#0d70bc>Character is airborne + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>', 4: 'Gravity Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Triggered when character lands</color>', 5: 'Kinetic Energy: <color=#0d70bc>Automatically accumulated when casting Radiant Whirlwind/Basic Attack speed-up</color>', 6: 'Airborne Spin: <color=#0d70bc>Anti-gravity Form + Tap Dodge</color>'}
Description: {1: "When Karenina: Scire has at least a set of 3-Ping Orbs among up to 8 Signal Orbs, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and consume 3-Ping Orbs (up to 2 sets can be consumed), each set granting Anti-gravity Energy. While charging, Karenina cannot dodge but gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction. After that, Karenina leaps up into the air with <color=#D91414>Leap Attack</color> that deals Dark DMG (its Base DMG increases if 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs have been consumed) and activates the Anti-gravity Form. When Karenina enters Matrix, holding the Basic Attack button will start charging and automatically consume Matrix's orb pinging effect (which is considered to consume a set of 3-Ping Orbs).", 2: 'Gains Super Armor and Extra DMG Reduction while in the Anti-gravity Form.', 3: 'When Karenina: Scire is airborne, keep tapping Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color>, dealing Dark DMG. Each Basic Attack tapped will increase the airborne time and spin speed.', 4: 'Upon landing, Karenina: Scire will trigger <color=#D91414>Gravity Overload</color>, gain Energy, and deal Dark DMG. If there is sufficient Anti-gravity Energy, Karenina: Scire will automatically jump up into the air again at the cost of some Anti-gravity Energy until there is insufficient Anti-gravity Energy, after which she will exit the Anti-gravity Form and all Anti-gravity Energy will be reset.', 5: 'Every cast of <color=#D91414>Radiant Whirlwind</color> and Basic Attack acceleration will accumulate Kinetic Energy. Casting <color=#D91414>Starshatter Horizon</color> will consume all Kinetic Energy and increase Base DMG accordingly.', 6: 'When Karenina is in the Anti-gravity Form, tap Dodge to cast <color=#D91414>Airborne Spin</color>at the cost of double the Dodge Gauge value, pulling and knocking back enemies around Karenina, dealing Dark DMG and restoring Anti-gravity Energy and Energy. Upon a successful dodge, Karenina casts <color=#D91414>Returning Repulsion</color> to pull and knock back enemies around her, dealing Dark DMG and restoring Dodge Gauge value.'}

Title: Rising Key
HeadLine: {1: 'Engine Charge: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack repeatedly</color>', 2: 'Extreme Combo: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Basic Attack repeatedly to unleash combo</color>', 3: 'Strike Rising Attack: <color=#0d70bc>3rd Gear + Unleash combo</color>'}
Description: {1: 'After casting a 3-Ping, tap Basic Attack repeatedly to charge the Rising Engine. When the tapping stops or after a certain period of time, Noan: Arca will perform <color=#D91414>Extreme Combo</color> based on the color of Signal Orbs pinged, dealing DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color>. Unleashing the combo will consume all <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> and enhance the combo DMG based on the charge progress. The <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> charge progress will then be converted into <color=#D91414>Target Speed</color>.', 2: 'The next time an <color=#D91414>Extreme Combo</color> is unleashed, if current <color=#D91414>Rising Energy</color> exceeds <color=#D91414>Target Spin Speed</color>, <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will increase by 1.', 3: 'If <color=#D91414>Extreme Combo</color> is unleashed at maximum Gear Level, Noan: Arca will launch <color=#D91414>Strike Rising Attack</color> instead with increased Extra DMG Bonus. <color=#D91414>Target Spin Speed</color> and <color=#D91414>Gear Level</color> will be reset to 0 afterward.'}

Title: Glowing Lanternlight
HeadLine: {1: 'Afterglow Orb: <color=#0d70bc>Upon entering battle or when entering Staff Form</color>', 2: 'Simulated Matrix: <color=#0d70bc>Staff Form + Press and hold Dodge to enter Luminous Realm</color>', 3: 'Glowing Lanternlight: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Signal Orbs to consume the Afterglow Orbs that are of the same color and aligned above them in Luminous Real</color>'}
Description: {1: 'When Bianca: Stigmata enters battle or enters <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, a set of <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> will be generated above the Signal Orb bar.', 2: 'Bianca: Stigmata cannot trigger the Matrix by successfully dodging attacks. When the weapon is in the <color=#D91414>Staff Form</color>, press and hold Dodge to perform <color=#D91414>Simulated Matrix</color> and activate <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color>.', 3: 'While <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> is active, pinging Signal Orbs can also consume the <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> that are of the same color and aligned above them, upon which <color=#D91414>Glowing Lanternlight</color> will be unleashed to deal Physical DMG to enemies within range. Pinging Signal Orbs and <color=#D91414>Afterglow Orbs</color> in the <color=#D91414>Luminous Realm</color> will both generate <color=#D91414>Afterglow points</color>.'}

Title: Puppet Theater
HeadLine: {1: 'Strings On Me: <color=#0d70bc>Jete Points + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: 'Solitary Dancer: <color=#0d70bc>Strings On Me + Take Hit/Release Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>', 4: 'Pas De Chat: <color=#0d70bc>Successful Dodge + Solitary Dancer + Ping</color>', 5: 'Pact of Memory: <color=#0d70bc>Solitary Dancer + 3-Ping</color>'}
Description: {1: 'With more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, press and hold to enter the <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> form and keep launching Basic Attacks.', 2: 'When attacked in the <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> form, the character spends all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, automatically dodges the attack, and enters the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> form. Upon full <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, the character will enter the <color=#D91414>Strings On Me</color> form. Release Basic Attack to spend all <color=#D91414>Jete Points</color>, the character will leap up and enter the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> form. The character can still dodge attacks in midair.', 3: 'When in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> form, spends Signal Orbs to cast <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> and deal Ice DMG. When <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> is active, the character will be Invincible and pull enemies.', 4: 'After entering <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> form by dodging successfully, spends Signal Orbs to cast an enhanced <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> and deal Ice DMG. When <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> is active, the character will be Invincible and pull enemies.', 5: "When casting <color=#D91414>Pas De Chat</color> through a 3-Ping in the <color=#D91414>Solitary Dancer</color> from, gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Memory Contract</color> and forgets and stops obtaining the Signal Orbs of the same color to the 3-Ping orbs. Signal Orbs of that color will be converted into orbs of another color. Memory Contract stacks up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. When the last color is forgotten and with <color=#D91414>3</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Memory Contract</color>, forgets the remaining Signal Orb(s) of the same color and stops obtaining Signal Orbs. Casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage</color> to clear <color=#D91414>Memory Contract</color> and refund the forgotten Signal Orb(s). <color=#D91414>Every</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Memory Contract</color> will increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Stringless Cage's</color> Base DMG by a certain percentage."}

Title: Dimension Observer
HeadLine: {1: 'Fate Records', 2: 'Realm Travel â€” <color=#0d70bc>Full Core Gauge + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'All 3-Ping Orbs pinged outside <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color> will be recorded and returned by performing <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>.', 2: "When the <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>'s cooldown is over, press and hold to shoot at the front area with the high-power sniper rifle, dealing Fire DMG and opens up the <color=#D91414>Hypermatrix</color>."}

Title: My Heart'll Do My Painting!
HeadLine: {1: 'Converging Expression: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Color Mix: Clash of Concepts: <color=#0d70bc>Main Color is different from Secondary Color + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Pure Color: Theme Emphasis: <color=#0d70bc>Main Color is the same as Secondary Color + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 4: "Vibrant Brushstroke: <color=#0d70bc>Painter's Realm + Any Orb Ping</color>", 5: 'Hued Splash: <color=#0d70bc>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis/Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>', 6: 'Art Influence: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>'}
Description: {1: 'The <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> is filled with a Signal Orb color by default. Upon a 3-Ping, Coolant in the 3-Ping color will fill the <color=#D91414>Secondary Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>1</color> type of Coolant). Subsequent Coolant will replace the previous Coolant.', 2: 'Performs 2 consecutive sweep attacks, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.', 3: 'Dashes forward before turning around for a sweep attack, dealing Ice DMG and gaining an extra buff. Gains Super Armor in the skill duration.', 4: 'Rides the Beam Gunlance and draws a colorful trail, causing an explosion upon hitting the enemy for the first time and dealing Ice DMG to enemies within the area. Gains DMG Reduction and Super Armor in the skill duration.', 5: 'Ayla: Kaleido restores <color=#D91414>15</color> Signature Energy to herself and heals her allies within the area every time she casts <color=#D91414>Pure Color: Theme Emphasis</color> or <color=#D91414>Color Mix: Clash of Concepts</color>, storing <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> of the <color=#D91414>Main Color</color> (max <color=#D91414>3</color>). When <color=#D91414>Vibrant Brushstroke</color> deals DMG, spends 1 <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color> to gain 1 set of 3-Ping Orbs in the same color as the <color=#D91414>"Backup Paint"</color>.', 6: 'Healed allies gain <color=#D91414>Frost Crystal</color>, which increases Ice DMG.'}

Title: Path of Anatta
HeadLine: {1: 'Formless Confrontation', 2: 'Sundered Delusion: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Foresight Charge</color>', 3: 'Resolute Blow: <color=#0d70bc>Foresight Charge + Release Dodge</color>', 4: 'Aphotic Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/Blading Radiance/Resolute Blow</color>', 5: 'Unquenchable Flare: <color=#0d70bc>Odachi in Hand + Activate Selfless Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'When <color=#D91414>wielding the kodachi</color>, Alpha can only use Blue Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Blue Orbs, which will be arranged in front of other orbs by default. When <color=#D91414>wielding the odachi</color>, Alpha can only use Red or Yellow Orb Skills. Her Basic Attacks will only grant Red or Yellow Orbs, and Blue Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Yellow Orbs.', 2: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>, gaining <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> over time. During this time, Lucia: Crimson Weave gets Super Armor and DMG Reduction, is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge, and enters the Parry Stance. Pinging Signal Orbs can also increase <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>.', 3: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Foresight Charge</color>. Afterward, release Dodge to perform a powerful slash and deal Lightning DMG, during which Alpha gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and is unable to restore the Dodge Gauge. Performing a powerful slash when <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color> is full will make Alpha Invincible, clear <color=#D91414>Blade Aura</color>, activate <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color>, and restore Signature Energy.', 4: "Gains <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> every time when casting a Signal Orb Skill, <color=#D91414>Blading Radiance</color>, or <color=#D91414>Resolute Blow</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> to increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare's</color> <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> based on the <color=#D91414>Aphotic Points</color> consumed.", 5: 'When Alpha is <color=#D91414>holding the odachi</color> with <color=#D91414>Selfless Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to launch <color=#D91414>Leaping Thrust</color> and jump up to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderous Bash</color> in midair, dealing Lightning DMG. When casting <color=#D91414>Unquenchable Flare</color>, Alpha becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno</color>.'}

Title: Silk Dance
HeadLine: {1: 'Spring of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Dance of Emerald Flow: <color=#0d70bc>At least 1 Dancer Point + Tap Dodge</color>', 3: 'Ballad of Wilting Bamboos: <color=#0d70bc>Dancer Stance + Ping Red Orb</color>', 4: 'Coda of Scattering Butterflies: <color=#0d70bc>Dancer Stance + Ping Yellow Orb</color>', 5: 'Verse of Singing Breeze: <color=#0d70bc>Dancer Stance + Ping Blue Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Hanying gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color> after any 3-Ping, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> Points.', 2: 'After spending 1 <color=#D91414>Dancer Point</color>, Hanying will perform a <color=#D91414>Choreography</color>, entering <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, recovering <color=#D91414>16</color> Signature Energy, and gaining <color=#D91414>1</color> stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color>. In <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into <color=#D91414>Dance Orbs</color> (with color unchanged) that cast <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> when pinged, and Hanying can only perform 1-Pings. Hanying gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction while casting Poise of Emerald Flow. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> or <color=#D91414>Vision of Mountains</color> by <color=#D91414>20%</color> (max <color=#D91414>4</color> stacks). Exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> will reset <color=#D91414>Emerald Flow</color> to <color=#D91414>0</color>. Performing 4 consecutive <color=#D91414>Choreographies</color> will leave behind a healing zone that restores the HP of allies in the area and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color>, which increases Physical DMG.', 3: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Red: Swings the fan to deal DMG, exiting <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.', 4: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Yellow: Steps on the airborne fan and dashes forward, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.', 5: '<color=#D91414>Poise of Emerald Flow</color> - Blue: Dances at her location, gathering surrounding enemies and dealing DMG. Exits <color=#D91414>Dancer Stance</color> afterward.'}

Title: Wolfish Twilight
HeadLine: {1: 'Fledgling Wings: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping</color>', 2: 'Dusk Fluorescence: <color=#0d70bc>3-Ping + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Forest Predator: <color=#0d70bc>During a 3-Ping + Ping Signal Orb</color>', 4: 'Wolfspirit Release: <color=#0d70bc>Press and Hold Basic Attack/Press and Hold Basic Attack and Then Tap Basic Attack Repeatedly</color>', 5: 'Critical Arclight', 6: 'Sheltering Wolves: <color=#0d70bc>Receive Healing</color>'}
Description: {1: 'No. 21: Feral generates a Shield at the cost of her HP when Casting a 3-Ping Skill. No. 21 gains Super Armor when having Shield.', 2: 'After casting a Signal Orb Skill through a 3-Ping, No. 21 will enter the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color>. Tap Basic Attack in this stance to cast <color=#D91414>Emergency Pursuit</color> to deal Lightning DMG, gain <color=#D91414>Hyperbeam Points</color>, and restore HP to allies within range. A <color=#D91414>purple mark</color> will appear temporarily when the <color=#D91414>Predator Stance</color> is active. Tap Basic Attack to cast a more powerful <color=#D91414>Perfect Pursuit</color> and gain more <color=#D91414>Hyperbeam Points</color>. During <color=#D91414>Emergency Pursuit</color> and <color=#D91414>Perfect Pursuit</color>, No. 21 will gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction.', 3: "Every time upon entering the battlefield or casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color>, No. 21: Feral will activate <color=#D91414>Forest Predator</color>, which will ping extra Signal Orb(s) to generate a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> and make <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> deal Lightning DMG when a Signal Orb Skill is cast through a 3-Ping. When there is a <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>, No. 21 will be invincible, the enemies will be slowed down temporarily, and <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence's purple mark</color> will last until the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color> is gone. Casting <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> will deactivate the <color=#D91414>Deceleration Field</color>. When No. 21 casts <color=#D91414>Dusk Fluorescence</color> and deals Lightning DMG, the Signal Orbs will be rearranged into 3-Ping sets.", 4: 'With max <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to enter <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>. Then, keep holding/tapping Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> by consuming <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> continuously and then <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> when <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Points</color> are about to run out. <color=#D91414>Growling Wolfspirit</color> and <color=#D91414>Scratch Reap</color> will pull targets within range and deal Lightning DMG, granting Signature Energy to No. 21 and restoring HP to her allies within range. No. 21 will gain Super Armor and DMG Reduction when in <color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Form</color>, during which time you can dodge to adjust your position.', 5: "<color=#D91414>Wolfspirit Release</color> attacks grant <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash</color> will consume all <color=#D91414>Critical Arclight</color> and increase <color=#D91414>Signature - Sky-ripping Arcflash's</color> Base DMG.", 6: 'Allies gain <color=#D91414>Lightning Surge</color> which increases their Lightning DMG after being healed.'}

Title: Powered Roar
HeadLine: {1: 'Impact Nullification: <color=#0d70bc>Tap Dodge</color>', 2: 'Heat Blast: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb</color>', 3: 'Energy Overload: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + A Single Orb + Ping Overload Orb</color>', 4: 'Thunderous Fury: <color=#0d70bc>Thunder Burst Form + Ping Blast Orb</color>', 5: 'Thunderclap Strike: <color=#0d70bc>During Thunderous Fury + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Noctis enters a defense stance and can dodge attacks in this state. Dodging successfully will trigger <color=#D91414>Arm Block</color>. When performing a precise dodge, Noctis will trigger <color=#D91414>Perfect Arm Block</color> to counterattack.', 2: 'In the <color=#D91414>Thunder Burst Form</color>, the rightmost orb will be converted to an <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color>. The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will be converted to a <color=#D91414>Blast Orb</color> 2.5s later.', 3: 'The <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will mark a single orb. Pinging the <color=#D91414>Overload Orb</color> will ping the marked orb as well and cast <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> afterward, dealing Lightning DMG.', 4: 'Launches a violent attack at the target in front, dealing Lightning DMG.', 5: 'Press and hold Basic Attack while casting <color=#D91414>Thunderous Fury</color> to perform <color=#D91414>Thunderclap Strike</color>, gaining Super Armor, dealing Lightning DMG, and receiving 1 <color=#D91414>Engine Point</color>. <color=#D91414>Engine Points</color> will amplify Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Skull Crush</color>.'}

Title: Echoing Twins
HeadLine: {1: 'Cipher of Synergy: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Basic Attack</color>', 2: "Sinbreaker's Judgment: <color=#0d70bc>Tactical Cipher + Ping Cipher Orbs consecutively</color>", 3: 'Majestic Splendor: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Ping Orbs</color>', 4: 'Swift Archery: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + Tap Dodge</color>', 5: 'Judgment Co-Strike: <color=#0d70bc>In Judgment Zone + 90 Splendor Points + Ping One Specific Signal Orb</color>', 6: 'Blessing of Fortitude: <color=#0d70bc>Upon receiving Healing</color>'}
Description: {1: '<color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fights alongside Echo. Press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo enter <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>. In <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Signal Orbs will be temporarily replaced by <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> will make <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> fire a swordwave at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then act based on the color of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged.', 2: "Upon entering <color=#D91414>Tactical Cipher</color>, Echo starts charging, during which time <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will prevent enemies from attacking her and repel them. Afterward, Echo gains Super Armor for 1.5s and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction. Cooldown: <color=#D91414>5</color>s. Keep pinging <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> or drag the joystick to keep charging. When orbs are no longer pinged or when the joystick is released, Echo will stop charging and fire a <color=#D91414>Sinbreaker's Arrow</color>, dealing Physical DMG. Echo can dodge attacks when performing this move. <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will then attack in the order of the <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> pinged, with each attack consuming one <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color>. After Echo exits the battlefield, <color=#D91414>Cecily</color> will stay and continue to attack enemies until all <color=#D91414>Cipher Orbs</color> are consumed.", 3: 'In the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color>, Echo gains <color=#D91414>10</color> <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color> for each orb pinged. The <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color> are capped at <color=#D91414>90</color>.', 4: 'Tapping Dodge inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Swift Archery</color>, dealing Physical DMG.', 5: 'At max <color=#D91414>Splendor Points</color>, pinging a Signal Orb that matches the color of <color=#D91414>Cipher Orb</color> inside <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> will trigger a <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color>. The first <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> after <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is activated will cast <color=#D91414>Imprisoning Co-Strike</color>. If Echo has <color=#D91414>Soul Shatter Mark</color>, she can trigger another <color=#D91414>Co-Strike</color> afterward while the <color=#D91414>Judgment Zone</color> is still active to cast <color=#D91414>Soulbreaking Co-Strike</color>.', 6: 'Allies gain <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> which increases their Physical DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8</color>s after being healed. The duration resets every time it is triggered.'}

Title: Seafoam Mirage
HeadLine: {1: 'Antinomy', 2: 'Wave Illusions', 3: 'Drowned Conformation: <color=#0d70bc>Primary Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>', 4: 'Dark Flux: <color=#0d70bc>Dark Tide Form + Ping Torrent Orb/Tidal Orb</color>'}
Description: {1: 'When Lamia is in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she can only cast Yellow or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When she is in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she can only cast Red or Blue Orb skills, and her Basic Attacks only generate Red or Blue Orbs. Yellow Orbs will be randomly converted into Red or Blue Orbs.', 2: 'When Lamia casts a 3-Ping skill in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, there is a short window of time in which she can consecutively cast another 3-Ping, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> skill. After Lamia casts a Red Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, consecutively pinging Red Orbs allows her to cast the skill again directly during the skill action. After Lamia casts a Blue Orb skill in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will start swimming in water, during which she can cast the skill again to rapidly fire water spheres to attack the target.', 3: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Primary Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color>, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front while also dealing a small amount of DMG to herself. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> is pinged, she will cast <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color> to pull in surrounding enemies, then detonate the undercurrents to deal Dark DMG. After casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>, Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Downpour</color>. Pinging a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> will change the weather to <color=#D91414>Storm</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction while casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Wave</color> or <color=#D91414>Suffocating Tide</color>.", 4: "When Lamia casts skills through orb pings in <color=#D91414>Dark Tide Form</color>, she will gain <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. For every <color=#D91414>30</color> <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, she will gain a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>. When two <color=#D91414>Torrent Orbs</color> are present, they will merge into a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>. When <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> and <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> are both present, <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> will be pinged to enhance <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, turning it into <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color>. At full <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>, pinging a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color>, <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color>, or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> will deplete all <color=#D91414>Fathomless Points</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Torrent Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color>, slashing to create powerful airflows, dealing Dark DMG to enemies in front, and entering <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. When a <color=#D91414>Tidal Orb</color> or <color=#D91414>Riptide Orb</color> is pinged, Lamia will cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, dealing Dark DMG. If Lamia is not in <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color> when casting <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>, she will ascend to the highest point to cast <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color> and then exit <color=#D91414>Tidal Form</color>. Lamia gains <color=#D91414>Ocean's Scar</color> after casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>. Lamia gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction when casting <color=#D91414>Crushing Torrent</color> or <color=#D91414>Tidal Vortex</color>."}

Title: Never-ending Conflict
HeadLine: {1: 'Reflective Nebula', 2: 'Limit Released', 3: 'Enhanced Blast'}
Description: {1: 'While performing a Red/Yellow Orb 3-Ping, pinging Red/Yellow Orbs again can interrupt it and recast the skill, dealing DMG based on the number of orbs pinged in the interruption, as well as gaining Blue Orbs equal to the number of orbs pinged when casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>.', 2: 'While casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> or <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color>, deals Extra Fire DMG based on the total number of orbs pinged during the entire action sequence (including both the original skill and the recast skill after interruption).', 3: 'Casting <color=#D91414>Basic Attack - Photon Hurricane, Basic Attack - Photon Strike, Basic Attack - Photon Cannon, Astral Edge, and Stellar Cross</color> will accumulate Blast Energy. When Blast Energy is full, casting <color=#D91414>Flare Strike</color> and <color=#D91414>Starry Bayonet</color> will deplete the Blast Energy and deal increased Base DMG.'}

Title: Veteran's Reflex
HeadLine: {1: 'Composite Structure', 2: 'Engine Optimization: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or upon entering Matrix</color>', 3: 'Fire Walker: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Press and hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Resilient Strike: <color=#0d70bc>Trigger Parry</color>', 5: 'Scorching Torrent: <color=#0d70bc>Assault Mode + Have 3 Shotshells + Press and hold Basic Attack</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Under <color=#D91414>Patrol Mode</color>, Watanabe can only use Yellow or Blue Orbs, and his Basic Attacks only generate Yellow or Blue Orbs. When <color=#D91414>Assault Mode</color> is activated, he can only use Red and <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color>, and his Basic Attacks only generate Red Orbs.', 2: 'After any 3-Ping, Watanabe: Epitaph gains <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Shotshell</color>, up to <color=#D91414>3</color>. Upon entering Matrix, he gains 1 <color=#D91414>Blaze Orb</color>. He may have up to <color=#D91414>3</color> <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> at the same time, and excess <color=#D91414>Blaze Orbs</color> will be converted into random Signal Orbs.', 3: 'Uses the grappling hook to pull in the target from a distance, dealing Fire DMG. If the target cannot be pulled, Watanabe: Epitaph will dash toward the target instead. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>40%</color> DMG Reduction while casting this skill. Using Basic Attack or Red Orb skill during the pulling action immediately triggers <color=#D91414>Parry</color>.', 4: "Upon <color=#D91414>Parry</color>, triggers <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> that grants a Shield equal to <color=#D91414>30%</color> of Max HP, deals Fire DMG, and inflicts <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces the target's Fire Resistance. Triggering <color=#D91414>Fortified Shield</color> again will replenish the Shield capacity. Enters Matrix if it is not on cooldown when Fortified Shield is triggered.", 5: 'Uses the grappling hook to glide around and descends from above, consuming <color=#D91414>3</color> Shotshells to pull in nearby enemy units and deal Fire DMG. While casting <color=#D91414>Scorching Torrent</color>, Watanabe becomes invincible but is unable to cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Explosive Purge</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>12</color> Signature Energy after casting.'}

Title: Blade of History
HeadLine: {1: 'Whisper Breaker: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping + Any Orb Ping</color>', 2: 'Mountain Caller: <color=#0d70bc>Into the Fray + Inscription Full + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 3: 'Enlightened Soul: <color=#0d70bc>70 Energy + Tap Signature</color>', 4: "Sovereign's Presence: <color=#0d70bc>Enthronement + Tap Signature or Cast Automatically When Enthronement Ends</color>"}
Description: {1: 'Ping any Signal Orb immediately after a 3-Ping to cast <color=#D91414>Tabula Akasha - Engrave</color> and summon Huiyu to attack the target, during which time Qu: Shukra gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction and rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Pings. Qu: Shukra enters <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and gains 1 <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> and 1 Signal Orb. Any 3-Ping during the <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> will grant <color=#D91414>Inscription</color>. Huiyu deals extra Ice DMG upon a 3-Ping or Basic Attack Phase 4 or 5.', 2: "Immediately exits <color=#D91414>Into the Fray</color> and converts all <color=#D91414>Inscription</color> to <color=#D91414>Glyph</color>. Summons an iceberg to temporarily freeze the target and then breaks it to pull in enemies and deal Ice DMG, gaining Signature Energy over time. Qu: Shukra will be Invincible during the process. She will be enhanced next time when casting <color=#D91414>Sovereign's Presence</color>.", 3: 'Begins <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, dealing Ice DMG to units in a large surrounding area continuously. Briefly triggers <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> during so. Meanwhile, each <color=#D91414>Glyph</color> is converted into a set of 3-Ping placed at the front of the row. During <color=#D91414>Enthronement</color>, pinging orbs or performing Basic Attacks will summon Tabula Vestige to deal the target Ice DMG. However, Signature Energy cannot be gained, and 3-Pings will grant <color=#D91414>Soul Ripple</color>.', 4: 'Qu: Shukra gathers the will of Kowloong and spends all <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color> to deal Ice DMG to enemies within a large area, triggering <color=#D91414>Time Lag Calculation</color> meanwhile. Immediately exits Into the Fray if in this status. When there are less than 4 stacks of <color=#D91414>Soul Ripples</color>, clear all Signal Orbs converted from <color=#D91414>Glyphs</color>.'}

Title: Source Infiltration
HeadLine: {1: 'Fraudulent Frequency', 2: 'Hacking: <color=#0d70bc>Any 3-Ping or QTE</color>', 3: 'Programming Stack: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Orb</color>', 4: 'Stress Integration: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Stress Orb</color>', 5: 'Iterative Glitch: <color=#0d70bc>Incoming Grizzly Chomp + Tap Basic Attack or Signature</color>'}
Description: {1: 'Decryptor can only gain and ping Red or Yellow Orbs when she is <color=#D91414>not in Analysis Mode</color>. She has infinite Blue Orbs and can only ping Blue Orbs when in <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>.', 2: '3-Pings and QTEs will inflict a <color=#D91414>10-second</color> <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the first target hit. Teddy: Decryptor will restore Signature Energy over time when the hacked target takes damage.\\n- There can only be 1 <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> on the battlefield. Upon the death of the hacked target, the <color=#D91414>Hacked Mark</color> will be inherited by a nearby target with its duration reset.', 3: 'Each Signal Orb pinged will grant <color=#D91414>1 Computing Point</color>. Max <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>. After casting a 3-Ping, Teddy: Decryptor will experience a temporary Computing Power overload. During the next 1-Ping or 2-Ping, you can tap Signature to increase the damage to that of a 3-Ping and get <color=#D91414>3 bonus Computing Points</color> at the cost of Signature Energy.', 4: "Gains 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> upon having <color=#D91414>9 Computing Points</color>. Max 1 <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color>. Ping the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> and Teddy: Decryptor will perform a girl's jump and throw out Grizzly Chomp, bombing the target upon landing and dealing Dark DMG. Teddy gains Super Armor and DMG Reduction.\\n- Pinging the <color=#D91414>Stress Orb</color> in the <color=#D91414>Non-Analysis Mode</color> will also restore Signature Energy to Teddy.", 5: 'Ping Combo 3 to summon back Grizzly Chomp. And then perform an Extreme Dodge to trigger the Matrix or knock it away with Grizzly Paws or Grizzly Stomp to follow up with a joint attack.\\n- Grizzly Chomp knocked away by Grizzly Paws will deal Dark DMG.\\n- In the <color=#D91414>Non-Analysis Mode</color>, Grizzly Stomp knocked away by Grizzly Stomp will deal Dark DMG and restore Signature Energy to Teddy: Decryptor. If in the <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color>, then it will deal Dark DMG and prolong the <color=#D91414>Analysis Mode</color> for <color=#D91414>2s</color> instead.'}

Title: Moonlit Coronation
HeadLine: {1: 'Waxing Course', 2: 'Eclipse Points: <color=#0d70bc>Gained automatically when casting Signal Orb Skills/casting Shattering Moon at max Crescent Points</color>', 3: 'Incipient Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Main Sequence + Activated Eclipse Stance + Reaping Moon + Release Basic Attack</color>', 4: 'Final Retribution: <color=#0d70bc>Finality + Activated Eclipse Stance + Press and Hold Basic Attack</color>', 5: 'Serene Advent: <color=#0d70bc>Cast Signature - Finality</color>', 6: 'Agitated Beacon'}
Description: {1: 'Enters <color=#D91414>Nova</color> upon entering the battlefield. When in <color=#D91414>Nova</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Yellow Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Yellow Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Red and Blue Orbs, and Basic Attacks will only generate Red or Blue Orbs. After entering <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Basic Attacks will not generate Signal Orbs, and no Signal Orbs can be pinged except for <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color>.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color> whenever casting Signal Orb Skills, or casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color> or <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color> at max <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color>. Eclipse Points will amplify the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color> in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> and the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color> in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>.', 3: 'When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, release Basic Attack during <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Incipient Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>24</color> Signature Energy. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.', 4: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color> with <color=#D91414>Eclipse Stance</color> activated, press and hold Basic Attack to cast <color=#D91414>Final Retribution</color>. Upon casting, Luna: Oblivion gathers energy and charges toward the target to pull in nearby enemies and detonate them, dealing Nihil DMG and amplifying this damage at the cost of all <color=#D91414>Eclipse Points</color>. She becomes invincible during so, unable to restore the Dodge Gauge or cast <color=#D91414>Signature - Lunar Downfall</color>.', 5: 'When in <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion consumes <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> continuously but is unable to gain them back through <color=#D91414>Reaping Moon</color>. Gains <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon Basic Attacks; restores <color=#D91414>30 Crescent Points</color> and gains 3 <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> upon casting <color=#D91414>Shattering Moon</color>. When the number of <color=#D91414>Crescent Points</color> falls to 0, exits <color=#D91414>Finality</color>, and all <color=#D91414>Finality Orbs</color> will disappear.', 6: "When in <color=#D91414>Main Sequence</color>/<color=#D91414>Finality</color>, Luna: Oblivion's Base DMG Efficiency dealt to Equilibrium Field increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>."}

Title: Surefooted
HeadLine: {1: 'Fortify: <color=#0d70bc>Not Moving + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 2: 'Discharge', 3: 'Effect: Ignition'}
Description: {1: 'Bridget: Ardeo blocks the attack with her Tactical Tonfas. She cannot move or restore Dodge Gauge during so, and Dodge Gauge is consumed based on the DMG prevented and her max HP when hit (Dodge Gauge is not consumed on a precise block).\\n- If there is enough Dodge Gauge, Bridget: Ardeo is immune to the hit upon a successful block. Otherwise, she gains DMG Reduction for the hit instead.\\n- After a successful block, recovers <color=#D91414>100 Fortification Points</color>, and an additional <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color> on a precise block. Bridget: Ardeo can have up to <color=#D91414>300 Fortification Points</color>.\\n- When she enters the battlefield, restores her <color=#D91414>Fortification Points</color> to <color=#D91414>150</color> if it is below <color=#D91414>150</color>.', 2: 'Once thrown out, the Energy Shield will stay on the battlefield with 6 Durability.\\n- Flying Sparks and Whirling Strike will knock the Energy Shield away, restore <color=#D91414>50 Fortification Points</color>, and consume 1 Durability.\\n- The Energy Shield will trigger Detect and Counter and Fortify and consume 1 Durability.\\n- Extreme Dodge of the Energy Shield will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.\\n- Bridget: Ardeo will gain a shield and 1 Blue Orb upon retrieving the Energy Shield.', 3: 'Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

Title: Court Ballad
HeadLine: {1: 'Ethereal Elegance', 2: 'Open String: <color=#0d70bc>Ping Harmonic Orbs</color>', 3: 'Jade Bloom: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + 30 Sonority + Tap Signature</color>', 4: 'Ethereal Symphony: <color=#0d70bc>Lunartone Field + Jade Bloom: Full</color>', 5: 'Ringing: <color=#0d70bc>Attacker Mode + Dream Mark + Tap Basic Attack</color>', 6: 'Effect: Ultima Slash'}
Description: {1: 'When in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into White Orbs. When in <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, all Signal Orbs transform into Blue Orbs. Gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction while Hanying: Solacetune has a shield.', 2: 'Gains the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> in <color=#D91414>Chord Mode</color> after pinging 6 White Orbs. While a <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color> exists, Red and Yellow Orbs are temporarily hidden. Upon pinging the <color=#D91414>Harmonic Orb</color>, the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> will unfold. While the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color> exists, it will weaken enemy units within the field and strengthen friendly units. When <color=#D91414>Hanying: Solacetune</color> leaves or casts <color=#D91414>Signature - Moon Chill</color>, exits the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>.', 3: 'Basic Attack and Signal Orb Skill generate <color=#D91414>Sonority</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>120 points</color>. In <color=#D91414>Attacker Mode</color>, tapping Signature button consumes <color=#D91414>30 Sonority</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom</color>, dealing Physical DMG to the target. A successful hit triggers <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color>. While casting Jade Bloom, gains Super Armor and can dodge attacks. Consecutive casting of Jade Bloom increase its Base DMG by <color=#D91414>50%</color> each time, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>2</color> stacks. Once the maximum damage is reached, subsequent casting will maintain this highest damage. Each casting grants <color=#D91414>5</color> Signature Energy. Consecutive casting doubles the amount of Signature Energy gained, up to a maximum of <color=#D91414>40</color> Energy per casting.', 4: 'Within the <color=#D91414>Lunartone Field</color>, activating <color=#D91414>Jade Bloom: Full</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ethereal Symphony</color>. This will send out shockwaves, drawing nearby enemies, dealing Ultima Slash DMG and applying 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Dream Mark</color> to each target.
