HeadLine: {1: 'Devil Arm Energy', 2: 'Devil Arms Mastery', 3: 'SDT', 4: 'Royal Guard: <color=#0d70bc>No Movement + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 5: 'Trickster: <color=#0d70bc>Move Joystick + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 6: 'High Time: <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Tap Jump</color>', 7: 'Fire Weapons - <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Tap Fire Weapons</color>', 8: 'Provocation: <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Aerial + Press and Hold Core Passive Bar</color>', 9: 'Conjured Swords: <color=#0d70bc>Human Form + Tap Core Passive Bar</color>', 10: 'Effect: Ignition'}
Description: {1: 'When consuming Signal Orbs via <color=#D91414>Devil Sword Dante</color>, <color=#D91414>Dr. Faust</color>, or <color=#D91414>Balrog</color>, or when casting <color=#D91414>DSD Combo</color> and <color=#D91414>Balrog Combo</color>, gain <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color>. When <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> is full, <color=#D91414>Devil Arm Energy</color> will be consumed to enhance the effects of <color=#D91414>Dance Macabre</color>, <color=#D91414>Real Impact</color>, and <color=#D91414>Red Hot Night</color>.', 2: 'Gains <color=#D91414>3</color> Energy Orbs upon entering the battlefield. When possessing different marks, Dante gains different enhancement effects.', 3: 'Consume <color=#D91414>SDT</color>, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Judgement Points</color>. Upon cast, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 4: "Blocks an enemy's attack. Release the block to deal Fire DMG in retaliation.", 5: 'When cast on the ground, blinks above the enemy. When cast midair, blinks to the ground below the enemy.', 6: 'When cast on the ground, jump upwards.', 7: 'Shoots the enemy, dealing Fire DMG.', 8: 'Throws a rose at the enemy.', 9: 'Summons Conjured Swords to launch an upper slash at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG.', 10: 'Combustible: Every <color=#D91414>250</color> Combustible Charges will add <color=#D91414>1</color> Combustible stack, up to 20 stacks.'}

Title: Abyssal Rebirth
HeadLine: {1: 'Changing Tides', 2: 'Commandment', 3: 'Abyssal Expansion: <color=#0d70bc>Twilight Form + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 4: 'Repelling Guard: <color=#0d70bc>Radiance Form + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 5: 'Effect: Raydiance'}
Description: {1: 'Bianca: Crepuscule enters the battlefield in Twilight Form. She can only ping Red Orbs and the Blue Orb in Twilight Form, and she can only ping Yellow Orbs and the Blue Orb in Radiance Form.', 2: 'Casting certain skills grants <color=#D91414>Commandment</color>. When <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> is full, Blue Orb becomes available.', 3: 'Bianca: Crepuscule cannot trigger the Matrix by successfully dodging attacks when she is in Twilight Form. However, pressing and holding Dodge allows her to perform a Matrix Simulation and activate <color=#D91414>Abyssal Domain</color>.', 4: 'Pressing and holding Dodge in Radiance Form will enter <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, during which Bianca: Crepuscule continuously gains <color=#D91414>Commandment</color> and Super Armor. When she is attacked during <color=#D91414>Repelling Guard - Charge</color>, Dodge Gauge is consumed to dodge automatically, up to <color=#D91414>3</color> times. Afterward, attacks will instead be blocked automatically, and Bianca gains 20% DMG Reduction when blocking. When the maximum duration is reached or Dodge is manually released, Bianca casts the corresponding skill and deals Raydiance DMG.', 5: 'Accumulates <color=#D91414>Raydiance Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, Bianca can enter <color=#D91414>Radiant Baptism Form</color> by casting certain skills and gain <color=#D91414>10</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color>. Some skills consume <color=#D91414>Radiant Crown</color> stacks and grant enhancements while triggering <color=#D91414>Radiant Embrace</color> to deal Raydiance DMG.'}

Title: Crushing Fang
HeadLine: {1: 'Silent Rampancy', 2: 'Final Rite', 3: 'Converging Edge: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Disentangle</color>', 4: 'Purgatory Shear: <color=#0d70bc>Press and hold Dodge to enter Disentangle, then release Dodge</color>', 5: 'Effect: Ultima Slash'}
Description: {1: 'While in <color=#D91414>Silent Consent</color>, only Blue and Yellow Orbs can be used. Under <color=#D91414>Rampant Disaster</color>, only Red Orbs can be used.', 2: 'When casting Yellow or Blue Orb skills, <color=#D91414>Converging Edge</color> grants <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color>. Casting <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear or Focused Rending</color> consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> and increases the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear and Focused Rending</color> based on <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed.', 3: "Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color> and gain <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> over time. While it's active, gains Super Armor, becomes unable to restore Dodge Gauge, and assumes parry stance. During <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>, automatically 3-Pings Signal Orbs and increases <color=#D91414>Purgatory Shear's</color> DMG.", 4: 'Press and hold Dodge to enter <color=#D91414>Disentangle</color>, then release Dodge to unleash a powerful slash, which consumes all <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> to deal Physical DMG based on <color=#D91414>Cutting Edge</color> consumed. Grants Signature Energy and Sharp Reserve.', 5: 'Certain skills build up <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be passed on to the next character affected by Ultima Slash effect, up to <color=#D91414>999</color> points.'}

Title: Purging Judgment
HeadLine: {1: 'Raid Support', 2: 'Blazing Star: <color=#0d70bc>Execution Airborne + Tap or Press and Hold Dodge When Not Moving Joystick / Press and Hold Dodge When Moving Joystick</color>', 3: 'Molten Blaze', 4: 'Relit', 5: 'Effect: Ignition'}
Description: {1: 'During <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color>, only Blue Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Blue Orbs.\\n- During <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, only Red Orbs and Yellow Orb can be used. Basic attacks only generate Red Orbs.\\n- When entering <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Blue Orbs from <color=#D91414>Adjudication</color> are retained and <color=#D91414>Chaos Value</color> is cleared.\\n- When exiting <color=#D91414>Execution</color>, unused Red Orbs are cleared and <color=#D91414>Sin Mark</color> is removed.', 2: 'Veronica: Aegis wields her Lance to perform consecutive thrusts in the air, dealing Physical DMG and recovering Red Orbs.\\n- When having <color=#D91414>Searing Sight</color>, deals Ignition DMG instead.\\n- When casting <color=#D91414>Blazing Star</color>, a dodge check will be performed. Successfully dodging will trigger Matrix if it is not on cooldown.', 3: 'Ally units healed by Veronica: Aegis gain an enhancement effect.', 4: 'Each stack of <color=#D91414>Ember Mark</color> increases Ignition Effect Base DMG.', 5: 'Combustible: Combustible Charges will add Combustible stacks, up to 20 stacks.\\nIgnition: Ignited units take Ignition DMG based on the Ignition stacks (Tank Skills will not be triggered) every second for 10s.\\n- The subsequent unit will inherit the Combustible/Ignition status of the last unit on the battlefield upon its death.'}

Title: Light of Awakening
HeadLine: {1: 'First Light', 2: 'Heavenly Flash: <color=#0d70bc>4 Flying Blades + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 3: 'Mirror Flight: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Tap Mirror Blade Orb</color>', 4: 'Dawn Dream: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Flow Points â‰¥50 + Press and Hold Basic Attack or Mirror Blade Orb</color>', 5: 'Stacked Light: <color=#0d70bc>During Dream Dive + Press and Hold Dodge</color>', 6: 'Effect: Darkflow'}
Description: {1: 'Gains a set of 3-Ping Orbs every time upon entering battle.', 2: 'Summons a massive lightning strike to attack. When casting, can trigger lightning chain and gather enemies, dealing DMG; triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Consumes all <color=#D91414>Flying Blades</color> and gains <color=#D91414>45</color> Signature Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.', 3: 'During Dream Dive, the rightmost slot of the Signal Orb bar is fixed as <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>. When repeatedly tapping the <color=#D91414>Mirror Blade Orb</color>, consumes <color=#D91414>White Orbs</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color>, <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color>, and Signature Energy. Also gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction when casting.', 4: 'Leaps into the air to pull in enemies and crush them, consuming <color=#D91414>Flow Points</color> to deal DMG and gain <color=#D91414>Delicate Heart</color> and Signature Energy. Invincible when casting.', 5: 'Continuously launches shattered mirror attacks, dealing Lightning DMG. Pressing and holding Dodge automatically pings Signal Orbs during this time, up to <color=#D91414>4</color> times, then detonates enemies and casts <color=#D91414>Thousand Rays</color>, dealing Lightning DMG, while gaining enhancement effects based on the number of orbs pinged. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>70%</color> DMG Reduction when casting. <color=#D91414>Stacked Light</color> can only be cast once during Dream Dive.', 6: 'Every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve gained grants 1 Darkflow stack, up to 15 stacks. Characters with the Darkflow Effect will gain a Darkflow Aura based on the current Darkflow stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the Darkflow stacks reach the threshold, the Aura upgrades, increasing its area of effect and dealing massive Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.'}
